name: Kombo
headline: Unified API for HR, payroll and recruiting software
description: Kombo makes it easy for software companies to offer integrations with HR software. For example, a recruiting company could use our unified API to integrate with the dozens of recruiting systems used by different customers all at once instead of building an integration to each of them.

## Kombo API for HR, ATS, and Payroll systems
Kombo powers integrations for global innovators across HR Tech, TA and Recruiting Tech, Benefits, B2B Fintech, and many more use cases. 
HR & Payroll IntegrationsATS Integrations
##### HR Integrations
The world's leading B2B players leverage Kombo's unified API to seamlessly integrate with their customers' HRIS and Payroll systems.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/663103d04c2d5c7f6154b4e8/663103d04c2d5c7f6154b5a2_Ellipse%202.svg)
###### HR Tech
Automatically provision based on employee data, extract org charts, export data to payroll providers, and more.
[See more](https://kombo.dev/</use-cases/hr-tech>)

The world's leading Talent Acquisition companies use Kombo to seamlessly connect and integrate with their customers' ATSs.

## Why leading global B2B companies choose Kombo
Our exclusive focus on the future-of-work vertical enables us to be subject-matter experts in our customers' needs.
Deepest out-of-the-box integration with the HR, ATS, and Payroll industry 
Whether it's a sandbox environment that takes months to obtain, a tool constantly changing access requirements, or custom integration use-case for your enterprise customers – Kombo does the heavy-lifting, offering the deepest read and write integrations on the market.
Expertise and specialized guidance
We’re only focusing on HR and ATS integrations and that allows us to understand each of our customers’ edge cases in detail, as well as pen-test for every possible failure while constantly enabling more use-cases.
A partner for product and market expansion
Getting listed on one of our tools’ marketplaces or getting introduced to leading industry experts – we’re knees-deep in the space and are here to help you, as the preferred partner of several companies.
Best-in-class technical support
We’re here to help, and do it fast. From friendly API docs, access to our team of integration experts, engineers, and product managers via dedicated Slack that help that helps you resolve the most complex issues within hours.
## An end-to-end seamless experience
From your product team integrating Kombo to your customers connecting their systems through Kombo’s white-label solution.
DashboardScopes configLogsCoverage
##### Dashboard
The operating cockpit for all your customer integrations.Our comprehensive dashboard offers a clear overview of all your integrations, providing real-time status updates to ensure smooth operations. Effortlessly manage your customers and quickly address synchronization issues, all from one centralized location.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/663103d04c2d5c7f6154b4e8/663103d04c2d5c7f6154b573_dashboard.png)
##### Scopes config
Customize your data collection with precision.Our scopes enable to control and anonymize the data extracted and stored, ensuring privacy, GDPR-compliance and security. Choose to enable, disable, or set fields as optional, ensuring you gather only the required information needed.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/663103d04c2d5c7f6154b4e8/663103d04c2d5c7f6154b57c_scopes.png)
##### Logs
Automated Issue DetectionOur logs provide a detailed historical record of all events, including issues and successful synchronizations. Gain actionable insights with clear guidance on necessary steps for you or your customers to resolve any errors, ensuring continuous system optimization.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/663103d04c2d5c7f6154b4e8/663103d04c2d5c7f6154b575_logs.png)
##### Coverage
Explore our dynamic coverage grid to see which data points are supported. Visualize where certain features are available, not offered by the tool, and where we are expanding our capabilities. If a needed data point is unsupported, you can simply request it directly from the dashboard.

## Why leading global B2B companies choose Kombo
Our exclusive focus on the future-of-work vertical enables us to be subject-matter experts in our customers' needs.
Deepest out-of-the-box integration with the HR, ATS, and Payroll industry 
Whether it's a sandbox environment that takes months to obtain, a tool constantly changing access requirements, or custom integration use-case for your enterprise customers – Kombo does the heavy-lifting, offering the deepest read and write integrations on the market.
Expertise and specialized guidance
We’re only focusing on HR and ATS integrations and that allows us to understand each of our customers’ edge cases in detail, as well as pen-test for every possible failure while constantly enabling more use-cases.
A partner for product and market expansion
Getting listed on one of our tools’ marketplaces or getting introduced to leading industry experts – we’re knees-deep in the space and are here to help you, as the preferred partner of several companies.
Best-in-class technical support
We’re here to help, and do it fast. From friendly API docs, access to our team of integration experts, engineers, and product managers via dedicated Slack that help that helps you resolve the most complex issues within hours.

generated_description:
## Overview of Kombo

Kombo is a forward-thinking startup founded in 2022, based in Berlin, Germany, and is currently a member of Y Combinator's Batch S22. At its core, Kombo aims to revolutionize how businesses integrate various HR, payroll, and recruiting systems through a unified API. Picture this: instead of spending countless hours and resources building individual integrations for different systems, software companies can now use Kombo's single API to connect with a wide range of recruiting and HR platforms simultaneously.

### Mission

Kombo's mission is simple yet powerful: to provide a unified API for HR, payroll, and recruiting software. By consolidating multiple integrations into one accessible platform, Kombo makes life easier for both developers and businesses.

### The Problem It Solves

Traditionally, software companies faced significant hurdles when trying to integrate with various HR software solutions. Each system might have its own unique integration requirements, making the process tedious and time-consuming. By using Kombo, a recruiting firm can seamlessly connect with numerous recruiting systems all at once, speeding up deployment and improving the overall user experience.

### Current Offerings

Kombo's flagship product offers an extensive array of integrations across various use cases:

- **ATS Integrations**: Integrating with Applicant Tracking Systems (ATS) provides a robust pipeline for managing job applications.
- **HR & Payroll Integrations**: Streamline payroll processing through effective integration with various HR Information Systems (HRIS).
- **Talent Acquisition Software**: Enhance candidate experiences with seamless data flow between recruiting tools.
- **B2B Fintech**: Support financial technologies that require complex employee data synchronization.
- **Security & Compliance**: Automate compliance and training processes by ensuring seamless data updates in real-time.
